chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: This document is intended to help you to easily migrate from JBoss Developer Studio 4.x to 5.0. It also describes some common issues that can occur in the migration process, along with their solutions.

section.title: Other relevant resources on the topic
section.para: All JBoss Developer Studio release documentation you can find at http://www.redhat.com/docs/en-US/JBoss_Developer_Studio in the corresponding release directory.
For more information about JBoss Developer Studio please visit http://www.jboss.com/products/devstudio/.
If your problem is not described in the guide or you have questions or suggestions concerned both the documentation and studio behavior, you are welcome at JBoss Users forum.
